channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.title: Outside no 4 Millman Street corner with Rugby Street, 1st September
item.description:
Very large builders bag of Rubble, too heavy for the refuse operators to move, please can you investigate and have it removed

item.title: Trolley full of black bags, 1st September
item.description:
Outside 25 Lugard Road someone dumped a trolley full of black bags that look like dirt and leaves. I seen this trolley inside 15 Lugard Roads front garden for many months when walking past. The guy who did this his name is Trevor, I think. Please take the stuff away and talk to this man. I’m scared to talk to them about it. Thank You.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lugard Road, Peckham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Lamp Post Missing outside number 35 Roslin Way, 1st September
item.description:
This lamp post was taken down and seems to be due for replacement. A sandy hole with hoardings around it has been left for about two months now and is attracting litter. please could this be resolved.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Roslin Way, Sundridge, London

item.title: Post missing, 1st September
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cray Avenue, Poverest, London

item.title: Thames Water materials left on pavement and glass in the road, 1st September
item.description:
Thames Water materials have been left over the pavement, meaning the pavement is impassible and hazard to pedestrians. No access for those in wheelchairs or pushchairs. There is also glass in the road again

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Weir Road, Bexley, London

item.title: Large amount of pigeon droppings, 1st September
item.description:
The whole of the road is covered in dense pigeon droppings. It is unhygienic and can damage the surfaces. Needs disinfecting and cleaning thoroughly, with mitigating inputs considered to prevent ongoing problems with pigeons

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 57, Gresham Road, Brixton, London
